text: Hwang Geum-hee (born August 20, 1977) is a South Korean actress. Previously known by her stage name Ji Sung-won, Hwang began using her real name professionally in August 2013. Her most notable work is the critically acclaimed horror film Bedevilled (2010). ==Filmography== ===Film=== {| class="wikitable" style="width:500px" |- ! width=10|Year ! Title !
